name: INAmountType
desc: Constants indicating an account-specific amount to apply to a payment.

items.name: case minimumDue
items.desc: The minimum amount the user must apply to the bill.

items.name: case amountDue
items.desc: The amount due for the bill.

items.name: case maximumTransferAmount
items.desc: The maximum amount the user can transfer.

items.name: case minimumTransferAmount
items.desc: The minimum amount the user can transfer.
